name: Deadwood
summary: Events unfold in 1889 - about ten years after the series ended - as dignitaries and mist of the series regulars gather to celebrate S Dakota statehood. When Sen Hearst makes an offer to Charlie Udder for his property claim, and Charlie declines, the results are explosive.
